titleStmt.title: Sǝnkǝssār for the first half of the year

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msItem.title: Sǝnkǝssār for the first half of the year
msItem.incipit: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ንቀድም፡ በረድኤተ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ወበሠናይ፡ ሀብቱ፡ ጽሒፈ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ስንክሳር፡ ዘበትርጓሜሁ፡ ጉባዔ፡ ዘቀድሕዎ፡ አበዊነ፡ ቅዱሳን፡ መምህራነ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ አብ፡ ክቡር፡ አባ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘሀገረ፡ መሊግ፡ ወአብ፡ ክቡር፡ አባ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ኤጲስ፡ ቆጶስ፡ ዘሀገረ፡ ቡርልስ፡ ወካልዓን፡ አበው፡ ቅዱሳም፡ ወክቡራን፡

signatures.note: Quire marks are written with Ethiopic numerals in the upper corner of the first leaf of quires from to .

handNote.seg: Titles; two lines on the incipit page of each month.

decoNote.desc: A printed image is glued on the inner side of the front board: a garden and some people swimming in a pool. India, in disguise, kills an old woman for attempting to devour seven saints.

item.desc: Scribal supplication preceded by a short rhymed poem
item.q: ዘአቅረብኩ፡ ማኅሌተ፡ አዘኪርየ፡ አእላፈ፡ እምእለ፡ ተጸምዱከ፡ ዘልፈ፨ ለእለ፡ አነብብ፡ እነብብ፡ ተወከፍ፡ ዘንዴትየ፡ መጽሐፈ፨ እንተ፡ አንተ፡ ረሰይከ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ጸሪቀ፡ መበለት፡ ውኩፈ፨ ለዘጸሐፎ፡ በክርታስ፡ ወለዘአጽሐፎ፡ እንዘ፡ ይደርስ፡ ለዘእንበቦ፡ ወለዘተርጐሞ፡ በልሳን፡ ሐዲስ፡ ወለዘሰምዓ፡ ቃሎ፡ በዕዝነ፡ መንፈስ፡ በጸሎተ፡ እሙ፡ ማርያም፡ አራቂተ፡ ኵሉ፡ እምባዕስ፡ ኅቡረ፡ ይምሐረነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡

item.desc: Spaces for the name of the owner have been sometimes left unfilled.

binding.decoNote: Wooden boards covered with reddish tooled leather.
Blind tooled ornament on the leather cover: crosses and other ornamentation.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.
